title: IBM Cloud overview docs
introduction: The platform is built to support your needs whether it's working only in the public cloud or taking advantage of a multicloud deployment model. Leverage the docs, API & SDK reference, architecture references, and more to support your app development needs.

section_recommended.title: What's included in the platform?
section_recommended.description: The platform consists of a network of interrelated components that work together to provide a consistent and dependable cloud experience to support your app development needs.

section_recommended.title: Try out IBM Cloud, for free
section_recommended.description: Get up and running quickly by setting up a Lite account with this short tutorial.

section_recommended.title: Service and infrastructure by location
section_recommended.description: Check out the regions and data centers that IBM Cloud products are available.

section_videos.title: Learn how to navigate through the IBM Cloud console

tiles.title: Software onboarding enhancements: progress indicators
tiles.description: When you onboard software to the IBM Cloud catalog or private catalogs in your account, you'll find new indicators in the console that you can use to track your progress with configuring and validating your product.

tiles.title: Support for third-party Operator bundles from GitHub
tiles.description: Third-party providers can now onboard Operator bundles from GitHub repositories to IBM Cloud by using TGZ files. Previously, the ability to onboard Operator bundles was limited to Operator bundles in Red Hat OpenShift registries. This capability is supported by the beta release of IBM Cloud Partner Center and our general availability release of private catalog capabilities.

tiles.title: Filtering the IBM Cloud catalog by product type
tiles.description: When you navigate to the IBM Cloud catalog, your view by default includes all types of products: services, software, and consulting. To help you quickly find the product that you're looking for, you can now filter the products to view services only, software only, or consulting services only.
